00089             function                pre_generation( $Options )
00090             {
00091                   try
00092                   {
00093                         $PageComposerUtilities = get_package( 'page::page_composer_utilities' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00094                         
00095                         $Path = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 'maps::google_maps' , '1.0.0' );
00096                         $PageComposerUtilities->add_javascript( "{http_host}/$Path/include/js/google_maps.js" );
00097

00099                               'maps::google_maps' , '1.0.0::1.0.0' , 'cf_google_maps' , 'google_maps_api_key'

00138             function                process_google_map( $ProcessingString , $Changed )
00139             {
00140                   try
00141                   {
00142                         if( strpos( $ProcessingString , '{google_map}' ) !== false )
00143                         {
00144                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( '{google_map}' , '{google_map:p=1}' , $ProcessingString );
00145                         }
00146                         for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( 
00147                                                 $ProcessingString , 'google_map' , 
00148                                                       array( 'width' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'height' => TERMINAL_VALUE ) ) ; )
00149                         {
00150                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
00151                               
00152                               $id = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) );
00153                               $Height = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'height' , '300px' );
00154                               $Width = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'width' , '500px' );
00155                               $Class = $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'class' , 'google_map' );
00156 
00157                               $Code = "<div id=\"$id\" class=\"$Class\" style=\"width: $Width; height: $Height;\"></div>";
00158                               $ProcessingString = str_replace( "{google_map:$MacroParameters}" , $Code , $ProcessingString );
00159                               $Changed = true;
00160                         }
00161                         return( array( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) );
00162                   }
00163                   catch( Exception $e )
00164                   {
00165                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00166                   }
00167             }
00168             
00199             function                process_string( $Options , $ProcessingString , &$Changed )
00200             {
00201                   try
00202                   {
00203                         list( $ProcessingString , $Changed ) = $this->process_google_map( $ProcessingString , $Changed );
00204                         
00205                         return( $ProcessingString );
00206                   }
00207                   catch( Exception $e )
00208                   {
00209                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
